price: Kendilerinden önce nice nesilleri helak ettiğimizi görmüyorlar mı? Onlar, bir daha kendilerine dönmemektedirler.
arabic: أَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَمۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا قَبۡلَهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرُونِ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِمۡ لَا يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam yaraw kam ahlaknā qablahum mina al-qurūni annahum ilayhim lā yarjiʿūna
